resources.string: You can not leave the input field(s) empty.
Values can not be higher than 100%.

This demo app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings.
Min charge target has to be bigger than current charge.
Please make sure you have internet connection!
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.
Location permission is required for this demo.
This app needs to have internet connection! Please turn it on now, to discard this window.
Please select the charging station you want to use on the map.
Are you sure you want to stop the charging early?
